values-param.name: initial.tips
values-param.value: If you are not taking care of your customer, your competitor will.
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
Without a customer, you don't have a business -- all you have is a hobby.
Pretend that every single person you meet has a sign around his or her neck that says, 'Make me feel important.' Not only will you succeed in sales, you will succeed in life.
I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
Working hard for something we don't care about is called stressed; working hard for something we love is called passion.
Do not interact with people who are not very fit for you.
Do not be afraid to take risks, you can change everything.
Nobody understands what he does: just remember this.
Start the day with a smile: nothing is charging a better one.
Make your day-trips in the outdoors.
Build a week with a vegetarian. And suddenly you like it?
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
